name: Achiever
title: Achiever
author: Gangsir
contact: PM me on Reddit, at /u/Gangsir. To submit an issue, please submit it at the mod's homepage.
description: Adds many more achievements for players that feel there aren't enough, ranging from progression based to difficult. When used with Bob's/Angel's mods, it adds some achievements for them. See the mod portal for a full list.
